Text: From what I have read many Orthodox Theologians consider the book \"St. Theodora\\\'s Journey Through the Aerial Toll-Houses\" of gnostic influence, hence non-Ortodox in its totality. I find it in a big percentaga as accurate from what i have experienced myself though it may have certain misconceptions.
Please read more about Saint Theodora in Serafim Rose's Book "The Soul after Death". You will find it very orthodox!
